steps.name: Roatating to Landscape mode if Potrait mode is selected in Mobile Screen
Roatating to Potrait mode if landscape mode is selected in Mobile Screen
Entering username into Username Text field
Entering username into Username Text field
Click on search icon from Home page
Enter input into search text field in search page
Select an item from Search results page
Get Description of the selected product
